turns.answer: You have the option to choose one of those three. You do this because the Mafia is a very powerful force. In the Mafia, any one of you can get caught. They will call you out on how weak and corrupt they are.

turns.answer:
I was sleeping in the hotel room, and my father was there to pick up my car. I was just talking to a friend. He was playing golf with me at our place, and he was not there.

I went to
